title: Hextech Issue : Not getting Keyfragments
body:
So for nearly a week I've won about half the matches I've played in _(ARAM, Classic, Ascension)_ And since the 6th when I opened up a chest after getting a 3rd fragment _(I know the exact date of this cuz of the "Purchase History")_ I haven't gotten another key fragment at all and it's really upsetting. I think I've had like 30 ~ 40 matches, won just about half of them, and before then I was getting them a LOT more regularly. At least one every 5~6 wins.

Did you guys change something, or put a limit on key fragments like you did chests? Can somebody explain? I have like 3 chests that I wanna open.

replies.body:
Heyo,

Remember, it's still a chance based system for key drops. As long as it's a matchmade game, and you win, you have a chance to pick up a key. Playing with friends and doing the same has greater chances iirc. Check out here to make sure I'm not remembering incorrectly!

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/2016-season-update/champion-mastery.html

If the current rates are working as intended, maybe they should be re-evaluated.  The number of people questioning why they're not getting any at all (rather than simply less) is something of a warning flag...  I know in my experience so far, it feels like the rate is on less of a curve and more of a cliff - I didn't get a single fragment between my 9th and the month reset.

Isn't there a limit? Because my last key drop was at march 20th and I've won at least 60 games since then without a single key drop

will u guys make a knowledgeable loot table to show what people can get in the hextech system in the future? because i know the promotional chests u guys plan to do will have a different loot table than it is currently

So lets just say that i got rid of my 10 game chat restriction 2 days ago, and i have an 85% winrate rn, but no keyfragments because of my previous abusive behavior (which i always learn my lesson rito <3 ) ,  its been a while and i think the fact that i cant earn anymore key fragments because of a lifted restriction, i think i should be able to earn them again no ? Please explain this to me !

Thank You for reading this ! {{champion:157}} {{champion:238}} {{item:3181}}
I dunno, it feels a bit long since I've gotten a key. Like, over two weeks. I play pretty much daily, I should have seen something by now. =\
Has the bug, where a small percentage of players can get stuck in a really long wait for keys to drop, been fixed yet?
You need the make the chances higher rito, i understand you want players to actually play the game to earn rewards, but the chances are a bit TOO low

There is something wrong, that's for sure.  I have five chests to open, but only one key fragment?  At my current drop rate I won't have enough keys this year.  I hope they adjust the rate soon.  Right now I need another 14 key fragments...   That cannot be right.

::: UPDATE :::
Last night I FINALLY got a keyfragment. Like 30 games to get one freaking key, and it took playing an a premade of 5 people. That's... Nuts.

I have 5 to open. I got a chest when I wasn't even supposed to get one (4 days until the next one opened, all 4 were dimmed out) and it bummed me out cause I really wanted a key fragment instead of a chest. And as soon as I opened a chest, I got another. So here I am sitting on 5 chests again. I've only opened two chests so far. 

I guess it's better than nothing, and I haven't made any loot yet. Just sitting on my materials waiting on key frags.
